mapper.select: SELECT notify.id,notify.sender_id AS senderId,notify.content,notify.type,notify.target_id AS targetId,notify.target_type AS targetType,notify.action,notify.create_time AS createTime,user_notify.is_read As isRead FROM notify LEFT JOIN user_notify ON notify.id = user_notify.notify_id WHERE user_notify.user_id = #{userId} AND user_notify.is_read = #{isRead}
SELECT * FROM notify WHERE notify.target_id = #{targetId} AND notify.target_type = #{targetType} AND notify.action = #{action} AND notify.create_time > #{createAt};
